events.title: Skansen Christmas Market
events.description: Historic open-air Christmas market with handicrafts, seasonal foods and traditional Swedish atmosphere.

events.title: Stortorget — Gamla Stan Christmas Market
events.description: Old Town market with ornaments, sweets and glögg. Great for evening photos.

events.title: Lucia processions & concerts
events.description: Candlelit choirs and Lucia processions across churches and schools.

markets.title: Hornstulls Marknad
markets.description: Weekend market with street food, vintage and local designers. (Apr–Oct regular season)

markets.title: Östermalm Saluhall
markets.description: Historic indoor food hall — great for gourmet finds and packed food souvenirs.

markets.title: Holiday pop-ups
markets.description: Small local holiday markets across neighbourhoods in November–December.

tips: Cards and mobile payments are widely accepted.
Markets may be weekend-only or have limited hours — check organisers.
Lucia is Dec 13; many choirs schedule concerts across December.
